#summary List of changes made in different versions of SyncSharp
#labels Featured

==SyncSharp Version 2.1==
 * Bug fixes
   # Bug fixed in re-ordering tasks in PlugSync form
 
 * Enhancements
   # Closed view log form after user has chosen to delete the log file
   # Change UI for PlugSync form

 * Documentations
  # User Guide V2.1


==SyncSharp Version 2.0==
 * Feature list
   # Preview a synchronization task
   # Restore a backup task
   # Added in help function

 * Bug fixes
   # Bug fixed in files attributes filters
   # Bug fixed for files exclusion filters
   # Folder filter form crashes upon opening when source or target folder is deleted from disk in the task
   # System crash when syncing files with absolute path more than 260 characters 
   # Normal file that overwrites a hidden file will cause an exception 
   # Incorrect amount of free space remaining, when folders are already in sync

 * UI enhancements
   # Change font for count down timer in PlugSync form
   # Change UI for General tab in Task setup form
   # Apply button : Disabled upon clicking, and re-enabled upon changes detected
   # Change the format of logger entries 
   # Added in analyze, restore and help buttons in main form
   # Added in Synchronization Preview form

 * Documentations
  # Developer Guide V2.0
  # User Guide V2.0


==SyncSharp Version 1.0==
 * Minor UI enhancements
   # Disable buttons when multiple tasks are selected for modify, rename and view log
   # Added in folder icons in folder filter form.
   # Change UI for PlugSync form

 * Bug fixes
   # Exclusion of folders filters is not working correctly.
   # Selecting folders A and A1 is disallowed by the program
   # Program will create weird folders and files when a root drive is synced
   # Applying folders filters and will sometimes delete the folders excluded when synced
   # Files/folders names during detection are case sensitive
   # SyncSharp crashes when creating log files for task name that contains invalid characters
   # Metadata files are not deleted when the task is deleted
   # Importing an invalid profile or profile with existing name will crash the system
  
 * Documentations
   # Developer Guide V1.0
   # User Guide V1.0
